main event: A sighting of a silver, square object that fluttered and drifted away in Harrisburg, Pennsylvania on April 18, 1955.
interesting points: The object was observed for 15 minutes in the evening,It was determined to be unknown with no evidence to confirm it as a balloon or aircraft,Descriptions indicate it may have looked like a kite or debris,The sighting was logged under Project Blue Book,This report was received as part of the investigation into unidentified flying objects.
witness description: Civilian observer who reported the sighting.
